alert.note: Alert for Abbeville; Anderson; Cherokee; Greenville; Greenwood; Laurens; Spartanburg; Union (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Tornado Watch issued March 03 at 6:51PM EST until March 03 at 8:00PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 63 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 8 PM EST THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST GEORGIA ELBERT HART IN NORTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 4 COUNTIES IN PIEDMONT NORTH CAROLINA CLEVELAND IN WESTERN NORTH CAROLINA BURKE CALDWELL RUTHERFORD IN SOUTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 8 COUNTIES IN UPSTATE SOUTH CAROLINA ABBEVILLE ANDERSON CHEROKEE GREENVILLE GREENWOOD LAURENS SPARTANBURG UNION SC THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABBEVILLE, ANDERSON, BEREA, CALHOUN FALLS, CLINTON, ELBERTON, FOREST CITY, FORK SHOALS, FORTSONIA, GAFFNEY, GRANITE FALLS, GREENVILLE, GREER, HARTWELL, KINGS CREEK, KINGS MOUNTAIN, LAURENS, LENOIR, MAULDIN, MIDDLETON, MONARCH MILLS, MORGANTON, NINETY SIX, NUBERG, PATTERSON, PLEASANT GROVE, REED CREEK, RUCKERSVILLE, RUTHERFORDTON, SAWMILLS, SHELBY, SIMPSONVILLE, SPARTANBURG, SPINDALE, TAYLORS, UNION, VALDESE, AND WARE SHOALS.

area.areaDesc: Abbeville; Anderson; Cherokee; Greenville; Greenwood; Laurens; Spartanburg; Union
